about_the_game:
Built For Speed


What do you get when you bolt a pair of jets onto a road cruiser hovership? A freakin’ rocket, that’s what! They’re blazing fast, they can climb the walls and even fly.

Defy Gravity

Sure, these ships are fast but they’re so much more than that. Swerve, drift, corkscrew, loop the loop - whatever environment you’re in, it’s just you versus the physics. And when you take off, you don’t come down until you decide it’s time!


Master The Controls

Forget what you know about handling cars, bikes, even hoverships. These things are different. Start with the basics: left and right thrust is all you’ll need at first. Then later you can start easing into the pitch and strafe controls to give you that edge. And when you’ve mastered one vehicle, there’s another more powerful beast waiting to be tamed.


Compete And Win

Compete against friends or against the clock in a series of timed checkpoint challenges in different environments, from tight tracks to open playgrounds. And with community modded race tracks, there are always new challenges to take on.

Feature List

  • 16 vehicles each with a distinct power and handling profile
  • 12 tracks set in 6 different lush environments
  • 3 race modes: time trial, single race and tournament
  • Online and local multiplayer
  • Customise your vehicle
  • Custom tracks
  • Adaptive music

name: Twin Jet Racer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: i5 2.7GHz / AMD A10-5700 OR FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce 740 / R7 260
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: i5 4000-series 3.5Ghz / AMD 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 970 / R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Two jets. Two triggers. That’s all you need to swerve, drift, corkscrew, loop or even fly to reach the next checkpoint and top the leaderboard. Master the controls and the physics to progress to the next class of racer and unlock greater challenges. Compete against friends or against the clock.
